org.spongepowered.api.event.message

Class MessageEvent.MessageFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.transform.FixedPartitionedTextFormatter
      • org.spongepowered.api.event.message.MessageEvent.MessageFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SimpleTextFormatter>, TextElement, TextRepresentable, PartitionedTextFormatter<SimpleTextFormatter>, TextFormatter<SimpleTextFormatter>
    Enclosing interface:
    MessageEvent

    public static class MessageEvent.MessageFormatter
extends FixedPartitionedTextFormatter
    Formatter used for formatting messages within this event. This formatter is partitioned into three sections: header, body, and footer. This is in an effort to make formatting messages much more flexible and modular for developers allowing for appending/inserting prefixes, adding suffixes, etc.
